name: Bunnelby
description: The Digging Pokémon. They use their large ears to dig burrows. They will dig the whole night through.

abilities.name: Pickup
abilities.description: If an opponent uses a consumable held item in battle, this Pokémon gains a copy of it if it is not currently holding an item.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: When this Pokémon eats any type of berry, is heals for an additional 10% of its maximum HP (rounded up to the nearest whole number).

abilities.name: Huge Power
abilities.description: Once per short rest, this Pokémon may double the damage dice for a single damage roll. The player must announce that they are using this ability before the attack roll.
